---
name: Request Sound
about: Request a sound to be added to an existing system
title: ''
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''

---

## Country
Country of the system you want to contribute to.

## System
Name of the system you want to contribute to.

## Is it a System, Line or Station sound?
Specify "System", "Line" or "Station"

**System Sound**
- Provide title of sound (e.g. Station Announcement) and the announcement transcription (if applicable).

**Line Sound**
- Specify the Line name
- Are there multiple versions of the sound? (Yes/No). If Yes:
  - Is it the same sound on different rolling stock? (Yes/No). If Yes:
    - Provide rolling stock name (must be a model listed under the line)
- Provide title of sound (e.g. Door Chime) and the announcement transcription (if applicable).

**Station Sound**
- Specify the Line name(s) and Station name.
- Are there multiple versions of the sound? (Yes/No). If Yes:
  - Is it the same sound on different lines? (Yes/No). If Yes:
    - Provide Line name that this sound applies to.
- Provide title of sound (e.g. Next Station) and the announcement transcription (if applicable).

## Sound
Must include a sound file with the following criteria:
- Good enough quality
- Trim start must start at the exact beginning of said sound. There must not be any background noise before the sound plays.
- Trim must end at a reasonable time after the end of said sound, usually around 1-2 seconds. Crossfade (end only) is optional but recommended.
- Must be named something reasonable (e.g. station-name-next.mp3 for Next Station: Station Name)
